meanings: [형용사] (규모·정도 등이 작지 않다) considerable, sizeable, respectable
인물명 송 동, 설치미술가; 출생지: 중국; 1966~

vlive.korean: 상품! - 50만 원 상당의 상품을! A prize! - We will give you KRW 500k worth gift. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: A prize! - We will give you KRW 500k worth gift.

vlive.korean: [승자에게는 50만 원 상당의 상품이 주어지는데] 1등에게는 50만 원... [The prize is 500,000 won] The winner will get 500,000 won. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.108
vlive.english: [The prize is 500,000 won] The winner will get 500,000 won.

vlive.korean: [10만 원 상당의 편의점 상품권!] - 10만 원! - 축하합니다! [Convenience store gift voucher (100,000 won)] - 100,000 won! - Congrats! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.14
vlive.english: [Convenience store gift voucher (100,000 won)] - 100,000 won! - Congrats!

vlive.korean: [우승 팀에게는 상당의 우승 상품이! 과연 편의점의 달인은 누구~?] [Winner between two teams will be given a prize. Which team will be the winner?] View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.14
vlive.english: [Winner between two teams will be given a prize. Which team will be the winner?]

vlive.korean: [100만 원 상당의 상품권 증정] 100만 원 상당의 상품권을... A 1 million won worth of gift certificate... 듣기 View video 슈주 리턴즈 (SJ returns) : [슈주 리턴즈 : 스핀오프] 특규 리턴즈 픽쿡크라운 EP02
vlive.english: A 1 million won worth of gift certificate...

examples.korean: 250 grams or an equivalent amount in ounces 발음듣기 250그램이나 온스로 그에 상당하는 양 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: 250 grams or an equivalent amount in ounces 발음

examples.korean: The suggestion was greeted by hoots of laughter. 발음듣기 그 제의는 상당한 비웃음을 샀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The suggestion was greeted by hoots of laughter. 발음

examples.korean: He exercised considerable restraint in ignoring the insults. 발음듣기 그는 상당한 자제력을 발휘하여 그 모욕을 무시했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He exercised considerable restraint in ignoring the insults. 발음

examples.korean: They have considerable expertise in dealing with oil spills. 발음듣기 그들은 기름 유출을 처리하는 데 상당한 전문 기술을 지니고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They have considerable expertise in dealing with oil spills. 발음

examples.korean: The unexpected course of events aroused considerable alarm. 발음듣기 사건들이 예상치 못한 방향으로 전개되어 상당한 불안을 불러일으켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The unexpected course of events aroused considerable alarm. 발음
